pages.text: The Dragon is the child of the all known Ender Dragon. You have to hatch the dragon egg and it will grow over time. Later it is rideable and if it's big enough, it can even carry a chest. It loves to eat Orc skin but it also has nothing against raw meat so if it's low in health, feed it

pages.title: Egg Hatching
pages.text: After obtaining the dragon egg you will have to summon and kill The Eye to get the fame effect. If VoidZ is installed, you have to kill the Void Shadow instead. Build a nest at your base to hatch the egg safely. If it feels your fame, it will start to hatch and emit particles

pages.title: Growth
pages.text: After the dragon is hatched, you can feed it with orc skin to grow up faster, if it's hungry enough. It grows up in size two times until it's a big dragon. After the first stage, you can put on a dragon saddle to ride it, after the second stage you can put on a chest and it is old enough to breath fire
